Ottawa Senators.fact: The original Sens were founded in 1883 but when under in 1934 and didn't exist again until 1992.
Ottawa Senators.opinion: I don't think I've ever felt more neutral about a sports franchise....

Daisy.fact: She almost a year old, and already 3ft long! She will get to be about 5ft!
Daisy.opinion: I love Daisy so much! She is my favourite little noodle :)

Dylan.fact: He is terrified of most bugs (he is 6'4", +200lbs)
Dylan.opinion: He is my lover!! One of my favourite people on the planet :D

Diet Drinks.fact: A can of normal coke sinks in water, but diet coke will actually float since its less dense!
Diet Drinks.opinion: I despise the taste of diet/zero calorie things... but i understand their use for others.

Ceiling Fan.fact: If they're installed correctly they should be on the ceiling!
Ceiling Fan.opinion: I don't trust them not to kill me in cartoonish fashion, but they keep me cool...

Wet Socks.opinion: yucky gross worse than dry socks

Socks.fact: The earliest known socks date back 1500 years!!
Socks.opinion: I hate socks. They make my feet feel weird and gross >:(

Nuts.fact: Peanuts are not the same as tree nuts, they are legumes.
Nuts.opinion: I am sad I cannot eat delicious lebanese treats due to the presence of nuts and my allergies :(

Jazzy.fact: This is my cat! She's a weird little beast!
Jazzy.opinion: Jazzy is one of my favourite things in the entire world :)

Bananas.fact: Bananas are actually big herbs, not trees!
Bananas.opinion: I HATE BANANAS!! There isn't any other food I am so repulsed by.
